issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

T

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

T

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Dutch filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hello! The analytics on the DuckDuckGo service. Please add to the list of link reductions from tracking parameters

Example:
`https://duckduckgo.com/?q=anything&t=iphone&iax=images&ia=images`

So can you add the following rule:
`||duckduckgo.com^$removeparam=t`

Everything works fine without this parameter. I had checked

Hello @Lion-hk

This site has too low traffic, and according to our filtering policy we only add rules for sites with more than 100,000 visits per month.
![1232647468nk](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18536328/226494388-e32e076b-8f09-4d6f-9437-b4017adb3706.png)

Please use these rules in your user rules:

```
bdys03.com#%#//scriptlet("adjust-setInterval", "_0x", "", "0.02")
bdys03.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "alert", "noopFunc")
```

AdGuard for iOS

Adguard 4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

Safari

Mobile

_No response_

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://mail.yandex.ru/?uid=20704923#inbox](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yandex.ru%2F%3Fuid%3D20704923%23inbox) ### Comment Username: @anykey71 > Если вручную выбрать и заблокировать данный блок рекламы в Я-почты, он блокируется примерно на 12 часов. comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please add this rule:
```adblock
senate.gov#@$##main-header, #nav-head-bg, #top-header, .nav, .sticky.clearfix.mobilehead { position: relative !important; top: 0 !important; }
```
to user rules.

<hr>

@yourduskquibbles Could you please take a look?

comment.body:
Yup
`akb48matomemory.com##.plugin-memo > div.side:has(> script[src^="https://speee-ad.akamaized.net"])` => better 
`#?#.plugin-memo:has(> div.side > div.uz-ny)` as the script tag will be removed on apps. We sometimes unblock speee-ad, but I think this should be minimal.

`##div[style^="font-weight:bold;"] > div[class="t_h t_i"]:has(> span[style="font-size: 125%;"])` no hit on my end. Maybe `##.article_body_more > div.t_h.t_i[style="box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"]`.

`akb48matomemory.com##.ad-article` Okay.

Plus
```
akb48matomemory.com##.article_body_more > span[style^="font-size"]
akb48matomemory.com##.section-title-single0
akb48matomemory.com##.section-title-style-2ch
```
for blogroll

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://globalpublishers.co.tz/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fglobalpublishers.co.tz%2F) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > Ads for Vodafone and something called Chapride on the right, and sponsored articles for casinos and Chapride in the article feed. I propose for AdGuard Base: > ``` > ! Ads on the right > globalpublishers.co.tz#?#.widget_custom_html:has(.mycenter ~ .mycenter) > globalpublishers.co.tz#?#.widget_custom_html [href="#"] > ! Occasional casino and rental ride adticles > globalpublishers.co.tz#?#.listing-item:has(a[href*=-sloti-]) > globalpublishers.co.tz#?#.listing-item:has(a[href*=-kasino]) > globalpublishers.co.tz#?#.listing-item:has(a[href*=-chapride-]) > ``` > 95% of the site seems to be in Swahili, with only some job listings on `https://globalpublishers.co.tz/category/ajira/` and some buttons being in English. > > The site is claimed by https://dnpedia.com/tlds/topm.php to have an Alexa rank of 52,365th, much higher than the site I was originally planning to suggest entries for (`taifaleo.nation.co.ke` at 1,631,996th according to SecurityTrails). ### Screenshots

issue.title: Google invaild search result

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Many websites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

In Google search result with a Korean language query, there are some spam websites that its domain is changed frequently.


It seems that importing the following rules is best idea.

```adblock
/^https:\/\/[A-z0-9\.]*[A-z0-9]+\.[A-z]+\/\?u=[A-z0-9]{7}&o=[A-z0-9]{7}/$document
/^https:\/\/[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\/[A-z]+-robot\/\?pl=[A-z0-9-]{22}&sm=[A-z]+-robot&hash=[A-z0-9-]{22}&exp=[0-9]{10}/$document
/^https:\/\/[0-9]{9}\.[A-z0-9-]+\.[A-z]{2}\/[0-9]{6}\.html$/$document
```

Related issues:
 - https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/598
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/139667

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

I propose for AdGuard Base: > ``` > ! Ads on the right > globalpublishers.co.tz#?#.widget_custom_html:has(.mycenter ~ .mycenter) > globalpublishers.co.tz#?#.widget_custom_html [href="#"] > ! > `#?#.plugin-memo:has(> div.side > div.uz-ny)`

On my end there is no `.uz-ny` class, I suggest: 
`.plugin-memo:has(> div.side > div[class^="uz-"])`

doesn't find an item that way either, maybe: 
`.article_body_more div[class="t_h t_i"][style="box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;"]`

issue.title: DuckDuckGo tracker

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
Hello! The analytics on the DuckDuckGo service. Please add to the list of link reductions from tracking parameters

Example:
`https://duckduckgo.com/?q=anything&t=iphone&iax=images&ia=images`

So can you add the following rule:
`||duckduckgo.com^$removeparam=t`

Everything works fine without this parameter. I had checked

issue.title: Blogspot tracker

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
Hello!
On all blogspot platform sites there is a tracking parameter `?m=`

Example:
`https://catmotya.blogspot.com/?m=1`

Solution:
`$removeparam=m`

This parameter keeps track of whether you log in from the mobile version or the desktop version. There is no such parameter on the desktop.

Its removal does not affect the performance of the sites.

comment.body: Nothing is tracked.

comment.body:
I guess that it is related to the conflict between AdGuard WPF driver and ESET anti-virus.
Please disable ESET's network-related feature (`Network and smart devices protection`, `Privacy and banking protection` or `Malware, ransomware and phishing protection`) or entirely.
Maybe removing the anti-virus is required.

<details><summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

AdGuard WPF 드라이버와 ESET 안티-바이러스 간의 충돌과 관련되어 있는 것으로 추측됩니다.
ESET의 네트워크 관련 기능 (`안전한 인터넷 사용` 또는 `네트워크 및 기기 모니터링`)이나 전체를 비활성화해보세요.
그 안티-바이러스의 제거가 필요할 수도 있습니다.

</details>

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Miałem ją włączoną (a właśnie dziwne, ponieważ pamiętam jak wyłączałem tą
opcje...) w każdym razie, teraz nie pokazuje sie to, wiec jest okej

wt., 21 mar 2023 o 15:09 Adam ***@***.***> napisał(a):

> Może masz włączoną opcję Użyj filtrów zoptymalizowanych w Edge?
> Obrazek

The link to the promotion number and the discounted list does not work with adguard installed on my machines (MAC and PC). I have Chrome, Firefox, and Brave. That particular URL is blocked for all of them. I am using https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query in my router DNS setting. Disabling adguard in the browsers does not work, maybe because it's the router DNS? The picture where the box is seen is from a machine where adguard is not installed at all. > > While making this query, I saw a lot of references to information on the settings for adguard, can you point me to the manual? issue.title: www.walmart.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.walmart.com/account/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Faccount%2Flogin) ### Comment Username: @misc-activities > In the Walmart login page (see 0.png), I entered my email address and clicked on the Continue button. It opened a message box trying to show me a "Press and Hold" type CAPTCHA but the CAPTCHA didn't load. This can be seen in 1.png. So, I clicked on "Try a different method" in the message box. When I did that, it showed me a picture identification type CAPTCHA (see 2.png). When I completed the CAPTCHA verification, instead of asking me for the password, it went back to the page where it was asking for my email address and showed a message saying, "Something went wrong, please try again." This can be seen in 3.png. > > I closed the AdGuard app and tried and I was able to login successfully. I also tried with Stealth Mode disabled but that didn't work. > > I'm having this issue in Safari as well. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/EevidNP.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/HE5788c.png)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/qwCTkAZ.png)
Screenshot 4 ![Screenshot 4](https://reports-img.adguard.com/fyb5z94.png)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Ublock Origin 1.47.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.thes-du-japon.com/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=1_130_3&products_id=123

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The _`/index.php?main_page=product_info&cpath=$document`_ and _`/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=$document`_ "malware/phishing" filter blocks legit websites. It's just URL part of certain shop systems.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: GoatRAT Trojan block request
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

GoatRAT was originally created as an Android Remote Administration Tool to seize control of a victim’s device. However, a new version of GoatRAT functions as a Banking Trojan, specifically aimed at Brazilian banks.

Like other types of Banking Trojans, GoatRAT utilizes the Accessibility service to implement an Automatic Transfer System (ATS) framework, which enables the transfer of money from the victim’s account using the PIX key. The PIX key is used to perform the instant payment. This malware currently targets three Brazilian banks: NUBank, Banco Inter, and PagBank.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40774281/226697704-8d3874d2-43e6-4dbb-a8bb-5796352dccbf.png)

URL font: https://blog.cyble.com/2023/03/14/goatrat-android-banking-trojan-variant-targeting-brazilian-banks/

### Proposed solution

Block URL's:
<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

URL | Description
-- | -- 
hxxps://bit[.]ly/nubankmodulo | Shortened malware distribution URL
hxxps://goatrat[.]com/apks/apk20.apk | Malware distribution URL
hxxp://api.goatrat[.]com:3008 | C&C server to receive PIX key

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.walmart.com/account/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Faccount%2Flogin) ### Comment Username: @misc-activities > In the Walmart login page (see 0.png), I entered my email address and clicked on the Continue button. It opened a message box trying to show me a "Press and Hold" type CAPTCHA but the CAPTCHA didn't load. This can be seen in 1.png. So, I clicked on "Try a different method" in the message box. When I did that, it showed me a picture identification type CAPTCHA (see 2.png). When I completed the CAPTCHA verification, instead of asking me for the password, it went back to the page where it was asking for my email address and showed a message saying, "Something went wrong, please try again." This can be seen in 3.png. > > I closed the AdGuard app and tried and I was able to login successfully. I also tried with Stealth Mode disabled but that didn't work. > > I'm having this issue in Safari as well. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
I have AdGuard Assistant enabled in Safari as Extension. Maybe that’s why it wasn’t listed in this ticket.
AdGuard Assistant in AdGuard Mac app itself (as a user script) is disabled because it is a legacy solution.

If I enable it, I will see an AdGuard button in lower right corner of my screen and will be able to use it to block an element.
However, since this is a legacy solution, I haven’t used it for years already.

Usually I use AdGuard Assistant extension for Safari, which is installed automatically with AdGuard for Mac.
And for this specific site pressing "Block Element" button simply does nothing.
It works on other sites just fine.


[cid:8FA427F3A94F4EA88B867550D5204EFA]
21 бер. 2023 р., 16:09 +0200, Sergey ***@***.***>, писав(-ла):

Hello @kikiwora<https://github.com/kikiwora>

I cannot reproduce this issue. Block element option in AdGuard Assistant works well for me.
Please check if you have AdGuard Assistant enabled, I don't see it in your list of enabled extensions.

pull_request.title: GoatRAT Trojan block
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met
